TopicTitle: Just a little note about "conspiracy theories" and this board.

Articles.Content:
As a note to the public,

'Conspiracy Theory' posts and threads of any nature, space-based or otherwise are not welcome on this board. Please do not post them as we will be forced to remove them in order to keep the peace. I do apologize, but this decision comes from on-high and is not up for discussion or debate in any form, private or public. The decision has been made and we will enforce that decision.

The Mod Team

'A conspiracy theory explains an event as being the result of an alleged plot by a covert group or organization or, more broadly, the idea that important political, social or economic events are the products of secret plots that are largely unknown to the general public.'
